comingsoon.title: Coming soon!
comingsoon.subtitle: You have to wait a bit more for the athlete's version. We’ll inform you via email when it will be ready. It’ll be worth it, we promise. Keep training!

pagenotfound.title: Page not found
pagenotfound.subtitle: You didn't break anything but we could not find what you are looking for. No worries we will take you to the homepage. Click the link below!
